content: [TABLE START] SALIENTS OF NET Candidates can appear in entry test more than once with the best score considered for the admission. However, in any one series only one attempt is allowed for a particular discipline. NET is compiled from text books prescribed for HSSC courses. Candidates preparing for NET are advised to consult all relevant text books of various boards of education. NET is conducted at four locations, that is Islamabad (NUST Campus), Karachi, Quetta and Gilgit. At Islamabad and Quetta the Test is conducted in computer-based format. In Karachi and Gilgit it is in paper-based format. | NUST Entry Test (Series-4) Application Form Last Date: 20 Jun 2025 If you are already registered for session 2025 , please enter user name and password to login. User Name: * Password: Forgot Password? Registration Closed | If you are already registered for session 2025 , please enter user name and password to login. | User Name: * | Password: | Forgot Password?

| SALIENTS of ACT/SAT basis Application ACT is conducted by ACT, USA. For more information, visit www.act.org. SAT is conducted by Collegeboard, USA. For more information, visit www.collegeboard.com. NUST institutional code to receive ACT scores is 2915 and for SAT scores is 2790. ACT/SAT scores are valid for 2 years. Female candidates cannot apply for MCE campus at Risalpur. Foreign nationals (Non Pakistani) / international candidates cannot apply for Aerospace and Avionics Engineering programmes offered at CAE campus Risalpur. The merit list for candidates applying on the basis of ACT/SAT for National & International seats is prepared separately. Last date to apply on ACT/SAT basis is 20 July 2025. | ACT/SAT Basis Application Form 2025 If you are already registered, please enter user name and password to login. [TABLE END] [TABLE START] NET-2025 Online Registration Test Schedule Islamabad Karachi Quetta Gilgit Series - 1 20 Oct - 03 Dec 2024 30 Nov - 13 Dec 2024 - Series - 2 22 Dec 2024 - 09 Feb 2025 08 - 19 Feb 2025 22 - 23 Feb 2025 27 - 28 Feb 2025 - Series - 3 23 Feb - 06 Apr 2025 05 - 16 Apr 2025 - Series - 4 13 Apr - 20 Jun 2025 15 Jun 2025 onwards 17 - 20 Jul 2025 26 - 27 Jul 2025 19 - 20 Jul 2025 | NET-2025 | Online Registration | Test Schedule | Islamabad | Karachi | Quetta | Gilgit | Series - 1 | 20 Oct - 03 Dec 2024 | 30 Nov - 13 Dec 2024 | - | Series - 2 | 22 Dec 2024 - 09 Feb 2025 | 08 - 19 Feb 2025 | 22 - 23 Feb 2025 | 27 - 28 Feb 2025 | - | Series - 3 | 23 Feb - 06 Apr 2025 | 05 - 16 Apr 2025 | - | Series - 4 | 13 Apr - 20 Jun 2025 | 15 Jun 2025 onwards | 17 - 20 Jul 2025 | 26 - 27 Jul 2025 | 19 - 20 Jul 2025 NET-2025 | Online Registration | Test Schedule Islamabad | Karachi | Quetta | Gilgit Series - 1 | 20 Oct - 03 Dec 2024 | 30 Nov - 13 Dec 2024 | - Series - 2 | 22 Dec 2024 - 09 Feb 2025 | 08 - 19 Feb 2025 | 22 - 23 Feb 2025 | 27 - 28 Feb 2025 | - Series - 3 | 23 Feb - 06 Apr 2025 | 05 - 16 Apr 2025 | - Series - 4 | 13 Apr - 20 Jun 2025 | 15 Jun 2025 onwards | 17 - 20 Jul 2025 | 26 - 27 Jul 2025 | 19 - 20 Jul 2025 [TABLE END] [TABLE START] NET-2025 | Online Registration | Test Schedule Islamabad | Karachi | Quetta | Gilgit Series - 1 | 20 Oct - 03 Dec 2024 | 30 Nov - 13 Dec 2024 | - Series - 2 | 22 Dec 2024 - 09 Feb 2025 | 08 - 19 Feb 2025 | 22 - 23 Feb 2025 | 27 - 28 Feb 2025 | - Series - 3 | 23 Feb - 06 Apr 2025 | 05 - 16 Apr 2025 | - Series - 4 | 13 Apr - 20 Jun 2025 | 15 Jun 2025 onwards | 17 - 20 Jul 2025 | 26 - 27 Jul 2025 | 19 - 20 Jul 2025 [TABLE END] [TABLE START] Programmes | ACT/SAT Scores Required Engineering Computing Programmes BS Biotechnology / BS Environmental Science / BS Agriculture BS Food Science and Technology BS Geoinformatics Architecture & Industrial Design | For candidates taken ACT Exam before April 2025.

ACT Composite Score (Consisting of Maths, English, Reading and Science Portions) with minimum score of 25. For candidates taking ACT Exam of April 2025 onwards. ACT Composite Score (Consisting of Maths, English and Reading only) with minimum score of 25. Science portion with minimum score of 25. Natural Sciences | ACT STEM Score (Minimum Score to apply – 25) Business Studies / Social Sciences LLB | SAT (Minimum score to apply in each subject – 550) OR ACT Score of Maths, English and Reading (Minimum score to apply in each subject – 25) [TABLE END] • Candidates can appear in entry test more than once with the best score considered for the admission. However, in any one series only one attempt is allowed for a particular discipline. • NET is compiled from text books prescribed for HSSC courses. Candidates preparing for NET are advised to consult all relevant text books of various boards of education.

• NET is conducted at four locations, that is Islamabad (NUST Campus), Karachi, Quetta and Gilgit. • At Islamabad and Quetta the Test is conducted in computer-based format. In Karachi and Gilgit it is in paper-based format. • ACT is conducted by ACT, USA. For more information, visit www.act.org. • SAT is conducted by Collegeboard, USA. For more information, visit www.collegeboard.com. • NUST institutional code to receive ACT scores is 2915 and for SAT scores is 2790. ACT/SAT scores are valid for 2 years. • Female candidates cannot apply for MCE campus at Risalpur. • Foreign nationals (Non Pakistani) / international candidates cannot apply for Aerospace and Avionics Engineering programmes offered at CAE campus Risalpur. • The merit list for candidates applying on the basis of ACT/SAT for National & International seats is prepared separately. • Last date to apply on ACT/SAT basis is 20 July 2025.

• Engineering • Computing Programmes • BS Biotechnology / BS Environmental Science / BS Agriculture • BS Food Science and Technology • BS Geoinformatics • Architecture & Industrial Design • ACT Composite Score (Consisting of Maths, English, Reading and Science Portions) with minimum score of 25. • ACT Composite Score (Consisting of Maths, English and Reading only) with minimum score of 25. • Science portion with minimum score of 25. • Natural Sciences • Business Studies / Social Sciences • LLB NUST Entry Test (Series-4) Application Form Last Date: 20 Jun 2025 NUST Entry Test (Series-4) Application Form Last Date: 20 Jun 2025 If you are already registered for session 2025 , please enter user name and password to login.
